text.0: with reverence and with offered gifts serve we the god whose flame is bright.
text.1: let us bring jātavedas fuel and adore agni when we invoke the gods.
text.2: agni may we perform thy rites with fuel and honour thee o holy one with praises.
text.3: honour thee priest of sacrifice with butter thee god of blessed light with our oblation.
text.4: come agni with the gods to our invoking come pleased to offerings sanctified with vaṣaṭ.
text.5: may we be his who pays thee god due honour ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
